channel.title: Company News on Herfom
channel.description: Recent content in Company News on Herfom

item.title: We hope to cooperate with you (recruit agents)
item.description: HERFOM GROUP CO., LTD. is a well-known manufacturer in China. We have rich production lines. We like to share with others and work together to create a better tomorrow. If you are willing to become our agent, we will be very happy. Become one of us.
